title: New: Baths – Miasma Sky
body:
**Baths**, it’s been too long.

Having released his debut album **_Cerulean_** to critical acclaim back in 2010, he’s since garnered a loyal following and played shows all across the world. Now, with the world at his fingers tips he’s unveiled the first cut from his sophomore record, **_Obsidian_** (Anticon, 28 May 2013). A bolder effort than we’re used to from the multi-talented musician, _Miasma Sky_ is everything we’ve come to love about **Baths**, merging classical influences with unrivalled production mastery.
